memberdef.name: uiops
memberdef.initializer: = { .request_input = finch_request_input, .close_request = finch_close_request, .request_choice = finch_request_choice, .request_action = finch_request_action, .request_fields = finch_request_fields, .request_file = finch_request_file, .request_folder = NULL }

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *title, const char *primary, const char *secondary, PurpleRequestType type)
memberdef.name: setup_request_window

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *title, const char *primary, const char *secondary, const char *default_value, gboolean multiline, gboolean masked, gchar *hint, const char *ok_text, GCallback ok_cb, const char *cancel_text, GCallback cancel_cb, PurpleAccount *account, const char *who, PurpleConversation *conv, void *user_data)

memberdef.name: finch_request_file

simplesect.para: The PurpleRequestUiOps structure populated with the appropriate functions.

detaileddescription.para: Save the request fields in preferences where the id attribute of each field is the id of a preference.
